title: "These New Tools Could Make AI Vision Systems Less Biased"
excerpt: "Two new papers by researchers at Sony and Meta propose ways to measure biases in computer vision systems so as to more fully capture the rich diversity of humanity. Both papers will be presented at the computer vision conference ICCV in October."
